display_long_description:
The provision of this app will cease on or around 22 December 2024.
You can continue to enjoy the DLed apps as long as the programmes that make up the apps run.
However, re-downloads, version upgrades and support services will cease with the end of the provision of this application.
However, re-downloads, version upgrades and support will cease with the end of the provision of this app.
If you are considering purchasing the app in the future, please understand the above and proceed to purchase only if you agree with the above.

--------------------------
The World's First Manga Platform for Enjoying Japanese Manga Comics in VR

Features.
The position and size of the manga can be changed freely.
You can switch between various backgrounds in the reading space.
You can add new manga in the VR space.
You can add new comics in the VR space - Can be used offline (need to download comics in advance)

Cominavi account is required. For details, please check (https://mechacomi.jp/).
